job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv STARFPE NO setenv NODEBUG yes setup 64b starver .DEV2 # echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' # if (! $?) then # set evtsFile = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` # set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` # set l = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` # else set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0; set f = 1 set l = 5000000 # endif echo "${evtsFile}" set filel = `basename $evtsFile .daq` set output = ${filel}.event.root if (! -r ${evtsFile}) exit 1; set logFile = ${filel}B.log if ( -r $logFile) exit 0; set muFile = ${filel}.MuDst.root if (-r $muFile) exit 0; root.exe -q -b -x 'bfc.C('$f','$l',"pp2017,btof,-beamline,BEmcChkStat,StiCA,stipulls,CorrX,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,-hitfilt","'${evtsFile}'","'$output'")' >& ${logFile}
